title: 4.AP.2
text: The student will plan and implement algorithms that consist of sequencing, loops, variables, user input, and conditional control structures using a blockbased programming language.
subject: Computer Science (2024)
subs: Identify user input and its role in improving a program.
Describe the concept of a variable.
Read and explain a design document to trace and predict an algorithm using plain language, pseudocode, or diagrams.
Create a design document to plan an algorithm using plain language, pseudocode, or diagrams.
Write programs that initialize, assign values to, name, and modify variables.
